COMIC PAGE IMAGE PLACEMENT INSTRUCTIONS
========================================

Place your extracted comic images in this folder with these exact names:

1. cover.jpg         - Front cover of DEV 404 #1
2. page-01.jpg       - Page 1
3. page-02.jpg       - Page 2
4. page-03.jpg       - Page 3
...
19. page-18.jpg      - Page 18

HOW TO EXTRACT FROM PDF:
-------------------------
1. Open "DEV 404 #1.pdf" in Adobe Acrobat, Preview, or online tool
2. Export each page as JPG or PNG (1000px+ width recommended)
3. Rename files to match the naming convention above
4. Place all 19 images in this folder

Once the images are in place, refresh your browser to see the comic reader!
